Package helper

Class TimeZones

java.lang.Object
helper.TimeZones
public class TimeZones extends Object
class with methods for converting time zones as well as checking business hours and whether there are overlapping appointments

    • checkBusinessHours

      public static boolean checkBusinessHours(String start, String end) throws ParseException
      Checks if the provided times are within the hours of operation for the business. 8am - 10pm EST, no weekends.
      Parameters:

      end -

    • checkOverlappingUpdateAppointments

      public static boolean checkOverlappingUpdateAppointments(int appointmentId, String start, String end) throws SQLException
      Checks if there are any overlapping appointments when updating an appointment. The difference with this function is that it excludes the appointment being updated from the query.
